name: Fan Feng
text: First time at a Mountain Mikeâ€™s. I got the 40% on Tuesdays for a large pizza deal. The pricing is decent for a tourist town. The interior was very clean with large tvâ€™s and plenty of seating (of course we could not eat inside because of the â€¦More

name: Patty Bannon
text: We asked for half Everest no olives and half pepperoni large pizza. Does that look like half Everest to you? Plus the Everest did not look like the one I order from Union City. Lack of toppings. It however was generous with the pepperoni.

name: new yoooser
text: I just opened my first ever Mountain Mike's Pizza, I chose the Everest, because it was a popular choice on the Uber eats app. When I say "sink my teeth into it" I mean, this pizza is thick and juicy enough to replace cardi B in all her â€¦More

name: Katherine Cross
text: The pizza is really good. It has lots of toppings. The delivery is fast. I definitely recommend this Mountain Mike location.

name: Renzo Bordoni
text: Really tasty!! Fast, delicious and the gluten free option tastes awesome

name: Oscar Malarin
text: I called and placed an order to mountain mikes in seaside. I advised i had never eaten here before and wa ted advice. I told them it was a family of 5 for a pizza. They recommended large. I arrive to pickup my order to find out they have a â€¦More

name: Vova Kovbas
text: The employee was very nice! Really good spot!

name: Joseph Chakola
text: Ordered the large pepperoni pizza and 6 piece buffalo chicken wings. Both items were really bad. I like how they slice the pepperoni pizza into smaller slices though but the crust was too thick. Pizza had no taste and wings were â€¦More

name: J M
text: Mountain Mike's makes an awesome pizza. It's a chain and may vary by location some. But so far the chains I have visited do a good job and if you're not satisfied they make good on it. This location does an awesome job.

name: Shirley Hoffman
text: The pizza and other items are great. I always love coming here with family or friends for pizza and pitchers. It would have five stars, but they only use cash or check. No cards accepted.

name: James Welshans
text:
Just a great place kate was just great.
Thanks guys...

name: Devansh Pandit
text: Awesome food and service. I loved the thin crust veggy pizza.

name: Tim Gadus
text: Mountain Mikes Monterey has the biggest TV and a full bar with nice seating in the bar area. Plenty of family seating outside the bar area and the pizza they know how to Crush! Get here for a good time, lots of beer on tap, good pizza and lots of seating ðŸ˜Ž

name: Josh Robinson
text: Cheap pizza at okay prices. Nice TV in the bar area for sports events. Nothing great to report, but nothing bad either. They do have ice cream as well as pizza (did not try). Can accomadate groups (10+ but less than 30 is my guess).

name: Elizabeth Lee
text: Delicious pizza and fresh salad bar.  Lots of TV's to watch any sport.  A lot of space to hold a small party.  Friendly staff and clean facilities.

name: Higinio Ramirez
text: Good place to get pizza and it also has a place to get ice cream. First place I have seen this, would recommend.

name: mike watkins
text: MM always at the of their pizza game!!! Great new restaurant, cool spot with plenty of TV to check out the games!!

name: Sergio Cervantes
text: Good taste.  Limited drinks available at the bar

name: PaoloDi
text: The pizza crust is hard and the toppings are dull and dry. Not again if i craved for pizza.

name: Mel Ainuu
text: Overpriced and there are a total of 3 games to play. No wonder the place is empty on a Sunday.

name: Subash Subba Chongbang
text: Love their veggie pizza with white sauce

name: Brenda S Meza
text: We stopped in to check out The New Mountain  Mike's location .   Right off of Munrus in Monterey.

name: Rachel S
text: Honestly wouldn't get again. Pizza seemed burnt and not cared for.

name: Bronwyn van Joolen
text: Mountain Mikeâ€™s charges too much money for pizza thatâ€™s not even on par with Dominos.

name: David Hughey
text: Great pepperoni

name: francisco hernandez
text: Great pizza

name: Ronny Mundt
text: (Translated by Google) For a fast food the pizza is too expensive. Otherwise typical American pizza, thick soil and very greasy. So nothing special. Can I eat, but I would not order again. â€¦More
